attributes.action: introduce a bill to abolish hate-crime legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That hate crime legislation amounts to nothing more than statutory discimination against belief.  That freedom of belief is sacrosanct and that no body or person should infringe upon the inalienable right to free thought.  That it is not possible to defend freedoms of expression or belief by curtailing them.  That a crime should not be defined by the ideology or motivation behind it.
